1000053838.title: Baby
1000053838.description: Post 26/11 Mumbai attacks, a special intelligence task force will stop at nothing to foil another such assault on the Indian soil.

1000120365.title: Badhaai Ho
1000120365.description: Getting a new sibling at 25 is the last thing Nakul expected. Will he ever come to terms with the embarrassing 'good news' of his parents being pregnant?

1000212789.title: Raid
1000212789.description: Fearless income tax officer Amay Patnaik carries out a risky raid at the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow. Inspired by real-life events.

1000233697.title: Total Dhamaal
1000233697.description: When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?

1260009172.title: Super 30
1260009172.description: Based on the life of ace mathematician Anand Kumar, who trained 30 underprivileged students to crack one of the toughest entrance exams in India - IIT.

1260011536.title: Mission Mangal
1260011536.description: Based on the true story of India's finest scientists who rose above hardships and failures to make us the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.
1260011536.detail: Mild violence, Mild sexual content and references

1260012713.title: Chhichhore
1260012713.description: Divided by time, united by a tragic incident. In a bittersweet reunion, seven middle-aged friends take a walk down the memory lane at the least expected place.
1260012713.crisp: Some Sexual References, Some Mature Content

1260014263.title: Housefull 4
1260014263.description: A set of six lovers had to part ways in 1419. Six centuries later, they meet again only to realise that they are marrying the wrong partners. Old villains and a series of mishaps turn this reincarnation drama into a comedy of errors.

1260022117.title: Tanhaji
1260022117.description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

1260091273.title: Shane
1260091273.description: The movie is the exploration of the rise of one of the greatest cricket players the world has known, Shane Warne.
1260091273.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Some Drug References

1260109951.title: Baba Baby O
1260109951.description: In his 40s, Megh becomes a single father with two children through surrogacy. Things take an interesting turn when he falls in love with Brishti.

1260110227.title: Brahmāstra Part One: Shiva
1260110227.description: A journey of fantasy, action and romance comes to life as Shiva enters the Astraverse! He discovers true love and also, the power of fire within him.

1260118821.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
1260118821.description: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M’Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers after the death of beloved King T’Challa.
1260118821.crisp: Some Intense Sequences, Mild Language, Fantasy Violence

1260131089.title: Veera Simha Reddy
1260131089.description: Jai's reunion with his long-lost influential father Veera gets chaotic when the latter's past returns to haunt him. How will Jai save Veera from his ill-fate?

1260131146.title: Gulmohar
1260131146.description: Batra family has just four days left to vacate their house of 34 years. Amidst the mayhem, uncertainties of the future, insecurities and secrets surface.

1260132120.title: Alone
1260132120.description: During the pandemic, Kalidasan gets stranded in his newly rented flat which turns out to be haunted. How will he cope with this eerie and mysterious lockdown?
1260132120.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Supernatural Content, Fantasy Violence

1260132190.title: Kaduva
1260132190.description: An intense rivalry with IG Joseph lands Kaduva in jail. But when he gets released, the battle for supremacy continues, wherein losing is not an option.

1260132510.title: The Legend
1260132510.description: A sophisticated scholar Saravanan arrives at his native town to serve the people. But chaos ensues when he lands in the crosshairs of medical mafia.

1260132747.title: Run Baby Run
1260132747.description: Sathya's simple life takes a drastic turn after he tries to help an unknown woman in trouble. How will he escape from this complicated situation?
1260132747.crisp: Mature Theme, Some Frightening Scenes, Some Mature Content

1260135303.title: Raavan
1260135303.description: When a ruthless Raavan disrupts the life of a kind-hearted Ram, revenge seems inevitable. With perils at every corner, will Ram be able to defeat his evil foe?
